requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A production manager who needs real-time updates on raw materials inventory.
user_goal: To view the latest raw materials data without any manual refresh.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Raw Materials Page
narrative_steps.description: Sarah navigates to the Raw Materials section of the system to check current stock levels.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /raw-materials route.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page loads and automatically fetches raw materials data from the backend API and displays it in a table.

requirement_tested: A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A system administrator responsible for deployment.
user_goal: To ensure the backend service connects to the correct database with provided credentials.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Service
narrative_steps.description: Alex deploys the backend service and starts it with predefined environment variables set.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run dev' in the backend directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Backend server starts successfully and establishes connection to PostgreSQL database at localhost:5432 using myappuser/myapppassword credentials.

requirement_tested: UI with light goldenrod background and olive drab colored elements
user_persona: A new user exploring the application for the first time.
user_goal: To navigate through the app and confirm consistent visual design.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Jamie opens the application and observes the overall look and feel.
narrative_steps.action: Load the main dashboard page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page background is light goldenrod (#FAFAD2), and all UI elements like buttons and tables use olive drab (#6B8E23) color.

user_persona: A procurement officer adding a new plastic resin shipment.
user_goal: To add a new raw material type into the system.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Add Form
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks the 'Add Raw Material' button after navigating to the raw materials page.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Add Raw Material' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal form opens allowing entry of raw material details such as name, description, unit, and quantity.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting New Material
narrative_steps.description: Taylor fills out the form and submits it to register the new material.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in form fields and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New raw material appears in the raw materials table without requiring a manual page reload.

user_persona: A product line manager introducing a new cup design.
user_goal: To register a newly designed paper cup in the system.

narrative_steps.title: Creating New Product Entry
narrative_steps.description: Jordan accesses the finished products section and initiates creation of a new product.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Add Finished Product' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Modal form appears for entering product details including name, description, unit, quantity, and price per unit.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Product Information
narrative_steps.description: After filling in all necessary information, Jordan saves the new product entry.
narrative_steps.action: Complete form and submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The new finished product is listed in the products table immediately after submission.

requirement_tested: Inventory tracking for both raw materials and finished products
user_persona: An inventory clerk recording incoming supplies.
user_goal: To log an increase in raw material stock due to a supplier delivery.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Inventory Section
narrative_steps.description: Casey goes to the inventory section to record the receipt of additional raw materials.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /inventory and select 'Raw Materials Inventory' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays a chronological list of raw material inventory transactions.

narrative_steps.title: Recording Stock Increase
narrative_steps.description: Casey logs the new shipment by clicking to record a transaction.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Record Transaction', fill in details, and save.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Transaction is added to the inventory log showing increased quantity for the selected raw material.

user_persona: A factory supervisor starting a new batch run.
user_goal: To initiate and monitor a production run for standard paper cups.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Production Run
narrative_steps.description: Morgan navigates to the production section and starts a new run for standard cups.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Start New Production Run' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form opens to configure production parameters like product selection and quantity.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Run Progress
narrative_steps.description: Once started, Morgan checks the status of the production run.
narrative_steps.action: View production runs list and click on active run.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Details show real-time progress including raw material consumption and estimated completion time.

user_persona: A sales representative completing a customer order.
user_goal: To record a sale of finished paper cups to a regular client.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Sale Details
narrative_steps.description: Riley goes to the sales section and begins entering details for a completed sale.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Record New Sale' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sale form opens with fields for selecting customer, product, quantity, and price.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Completed Sale
narrative_steps.description: Riley fills in all required information and saves the transaction.
narrative_steps.action: Complete form and click Save.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sale record is added to the sales history table with accurate totals and timestamp.

user_persona: A customer service agent updating client contact info.
user_goal: To modify an existing customer's phone number and address.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Customer Record
narrative_steps.description: Patricia searches for a specific customer in the customer management section.
narrative_steps.action: Use search bar to find customer by name and click on the result.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Customer details appear in an editable form view.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Contact Information
narrative_steps.description: Patricia updates the phone number and address fields and saves changes.
narrative_steps.action: Edit fields and click Save.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Updated customer information is saved and reflected immediately in the customer list.

user_persona: A regional sales manager reviewing quarterly performance.
user_goal: To analyze past sales made to a key customer over the last quarter.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Customer Sales History
narrative_steps.description: Derek selects a major client from the customer list to review their purchasing pattern.
narrative_steps.action: Click on customer row and navigate to Sales History tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Displays a filtered list of all sales made to that customer with dates and amounts.

user_persona: A business analyst preparing monthly performance metrics.
user_goal: To generate and view aggregated sales data for executive reporting.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Sales Statistics
narrative_steps.description: Bailey navigates to the reports section to pull up monthly sales figures.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Sales Analysis' report type.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard updates to show charts and summaries of total sales volume, revenue, and top-selling products.

requirement_tested: Detailed reporting functionality for inventory, production, and sales
user_persona: An operations director needing comprehensive operational insights.
user_goal: To export a full inventory turnover report for board presentation.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Report Type
narrative_steps.description: Cameron chooses the inventory summary report from available options.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Inventory Summary' report card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Report loads with visualizations showing current stock levels and movement trends.

narrative_steps.title: Exporting Data
narrative_steps.description: Cameron exports the generated report for sharing with stakeholders.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Export Report' and choose PDF format.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System generates and downloads a formatted PDF document containing the inventory report.

requirement_tested: Database schema supporting raw materials, finished products, inventory, production, sales, and customers
user_persona: A database developer validating schema implementation.
user_goal: To verify that all core business entity tables exist with correct structure.

narrative_steps.title: Connecting to Database
narrative_steps.description: Devon uses a database tool to connect to the configured PostgreSQL instance.
narrative_steps.action: Connect using DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Connection established successfully with access to database tables.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Table Structures
narrative_steps.description: Devon inspects each critical table to ensure proper schema definition.
narrative_steps.action: Query information_schema.tables for tables: raw_materials, finished_products, inventory, production_runs, sales, customers.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All six tables exist with matching column names and data types as specified in requirements.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for all core business entities and operations
user_persona: A frontend developer integrating with backend services.
user_goal: To retrieve raw materials list via REST API endpoint.

narrative_steps.title: Making API Request
narrative_steps.description: Developer sends GET request to retrieve raw materials data.
narrative_steps.action: Send HTTP GET request to /api/raw-materials endpoint.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server responds with JSON array containing raw materials objects with id, name, description, unit, and quantity fields.

requirement_tested: Package.json configuration with npm run install:all and npm run dev scripts
user_persona: A new team member setting up the development environment.
user_goal: To install all project dependencies and start both frontend and backend servers.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clones the repository and runs the unified install command.
narrative_steps.action: Execute 'npm run install:all' in root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend node_modules folders are populated with required packages concurrently.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Jamie starts both development servers with one command.
narrative_steps.action: Execute 'npm run dev' in root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend development server starts on one port and backend API server starts on another port simultaneously.
